articles.description: The Russian opera singer said she was ‘opposed to this senseless war of aggression’, but wouldn’t drop support for Putin
articles.content: Soprano Anna Netrebko withdrew from her future engagements at the Metropolitan Opera rather than repudiate her support for Russian president Vladimir Putin, costing the company one of its top singers… [+3287 chars]

articles.author: Jack Royston
articles.title: Kate Middleton Misses Opportunity for Meghan Markle Olive Branch Over Books - Newsweek
articles.description: The Duchess of Cambridge has revealed five of her favorite children's stories, but her sister-in-law's book "The Bench" was not on the list.
articles.content:
Kate Middleton has unveiled a list of her favorite children's books, but did not include Meghan Markle's story The Bench—missing an opportunity to extend an olive branch to her sister-in-law.
